item.description:
Ok, who wants a rematch at Cosmic Bowling?  Who missed the event in the past?

Well come on down to Leo's Metrolbowl in Peabody and have an awesome night of fun, and  bowling.

For those who don't know how to bowl....don't worry we go there to have fun not to have a competition.  The only thing we ask is for you to have fun and make some new friends.

We have made a deal with the alleys, we no longer have to pay for our shoe rentals.  This is a savings of $2.50 per pair.  Just tell the guys at the desk you are with the Meetup Group.

The price for bowling is $27.00 per hour, per lane, maximum of 6 bowlers per lane.

So come on down to Leo's and have a rocking good time.

Donna & Janet
item.name: Cosmic Bowling at Leo's Metrobowl
